testcase.name: AI Chatbot - Response Verification › should load chat interface and be ready for input
AI Chatbot - Response Verification › should send a message without errors
AI Chatbot - Response Verification › should respond to a relevant question about document content
AI Chatbot - Response Verification › should answer specific questions about the document accurately
AI Chatbot - Response Verification › should handle conceptual questions about the document
AI Chatbot - Response Verification › should verify document is uploaded via API
AI Chatbot - Response Verification › should verify AI response contains expected keywords via API
AI Chatbot - Response Verification › should retrieve chat history via API after conversation
AI Chatbot - Response Verification › should verify messages API returns correct structure with user and AI messages
AI Chatbot - Response Verification › should track message count increasing after each question
Edge Cases › should handle multiple file operations in sequence
Edge Cases › should handle duplicate file upload gracefully
Edge Cases › should upload file directly via API and verify it appears in UI
Edge Cases › should handle rapid successive uploads without errors
Edge Cases › should handle sequential chat questions correctly
Edge Cases › should handle questions with special characters
Edge Cases › should handle long descriptive questions without errors
Edge Cases › should return 400 error when chat is used without uploading a document
Edge Cases › should return 400 error after all documents are deleted
Edge Cases › should verify API response structure on successful chat
Edge Cases › should return error when asking without documents
Edge Cases › should show correct response in UI after document is uploaded
Edge Cases › should show chat input as visible but return error when no documents uploaded
Edge Cases › should reflect empty document list in UI after deletion
Document Upload › should upload a single TXT file and verify via UI
Document Upload › should upload a single TXT file and verify via API
Document Upload › should upload a single PDF file and verify via API
Document Upload › should upload a single DOCX file and verify via API
Document Upload › should not upload an unsupported file type
testcase.system-out: File upload blocked as expected for unsupported file type

testcase.name: Document Upload › should upload multiple files sequentially via UI
Document Upload › should verify all multiple uploaded files via API
Document Upload › should confirm document count matches between UI and API
Document Upload › should confirm specific document appears in API response
Document Upload › should verify document metadata fields in API response
Document Upload › should delete all files and verify count is zero via API
Document Upload › should delete all files and verify count is zero via UI
Document Upload › should delete a specific document by ID
